title: Wendel Family Memory Map
name: Wendel Family Memory Map
description:
A Map by Realestatecafe

Experimental map started Christmas 2006 as a collaborative birthday present for Mary Isabelle Collins Wendel, a.k.a &quot;Mom, Belle, Grandma Belle, who will be 76 on January 3, 2007.

properties.name: Bill's current apartment
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe 97a Garden St,Cambridge,MA 02138Bill has lived in this tiny apartment since just before 9/11/01. He loves it because it is in walking distance to Harvard Square.

properties.name: Cici's House
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe6 Lamont Ave, Cambridge, MA

properties.name: Cochran Gardens Public Housing
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe 1434 N 9th St, St Louis, MOOne of Mom & Dad\'s first apartments in St.Louis. Two or three Wendel children were born here between 1953 and 1957: George (1953), Bill (1955), and Peter (1957)?

properties.name: Fog covered trip to top of Cadillac Mountain
properties.description: Posted by RealestatecafeIn 200?, Mom & Bill drove to the top of Cadillac Mountain despite heavy fog, and little visibility. The trip was memorable but one we were glad to repeat on a clear August day this year, October ?, 2006.

properties.name: George & Diane's Current House
properties.description: Posted by RealestatecafeGeorge & Diane moved to this house in 2005. Meghan lives in the garage apartment.

properties.name: Jaime's Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe222 Church Street, Middletown, CT 06459

properties.name: Louise's House
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe8 Lamont Ave, Cambridge, MA 02138

properties.name: Mom & Dad's 1st home
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe432 Tuxedo Blvd, Webster Groves, MO 63105The Wendel\'s moved from University City to Webster Groves in approximately 1959 just before Paul Wendel, now 47 was born.

properties.name: Mom's current home (aka. Hotel Wendel)
properties.description: Posted by Realestatecafe 90 Arundel Pl, Clayton, MO 63105Mom (then 38 years old) and Dad (42 years old) moved here in approximately 1970, and bought this extraordinary 10 room, three story, English tudor-styel home for approximately 5,000. The family of six moved during the summer, when Bill was entering sophomore year at St. Louis University High School, George was entering his junior year, Peter was entering 8th grade, and Paul was entering 6th grade. Over the past 37 years, Hotel Wendel has also provided short-term housing for cousins and the next generation of Wendel\'s: Valerie Collins Pope lived here during the summer of 197? while attending nursing school at St. Louis University Carolyn Wendel lived here during the summer of 200? while studying pre-med at St. Louis University Meghan K... lived here during the summer of 200? while finishing her nursing program at St. Louis University

properties.name: Paul & Kathleen's current house
properties.description: Posted by RealestatecafeMoved to this house in 1994 from Dallas, TX. Lived here for 12 years. Hosted Christmas mini family reunion in 199?.

properties.name: Wendel Saloon @ 1884
properties.description: Posted by RealestatecafeLocation of saloon owned by George D. Wendel, Sr. License granted by the City of Chicago, April 14th, 1884, allowed the sale of malt liquor and groceries.
